*****************
*   vtape test
*****************
*
stopall
archmode S/370
sysreset
*
detach 281
pause 1
*
attach 281 3420 * vtape
pause 1
*
t+281
*

u 400-493
*
t+
*
*  (Before test)
*
r 494-604
*
*
restart
pause 2
* 
*  (After test)
*
r 494-604
*
psw
*
* (if above PSW is 'DEAD', then test failed)
* (otherwise test passed)
